scripts.startup:
-- global vars isSent=0
--disable AI disableAi(1) disableAi(2) disableAi(3) disableAi(4) disableAi(5) disableAi(6) disableAi(7)
function addAttackingEnemy(value,fno,pos) createUnit(value, fno, pos) givePositionCommand(lastCreatedUnit(), 'attack',startLocation(0)) end
function sendFlyingUnits() isSent=1 for i=1, 5 do addAttackingEnemy('flyingvalkyrie') end end
--my units createUnit('castle', 0, startLocation(0)) mycastle=lastCreatedUnit()
giveResource('gold', 0, 0) giveResource('wood', 0, 0) giveResource('stone', 0, 0) giveResource('food', 0, 0)
--allied units createUnit('sphinx', 1, startLocation(0)) camerapos=unitPosition(lastCreatedUnit()) createUnit('sphinx', 1, startLocation(0)) createUnit('sphinx', 1, startLocation(0))
for i=1, 3 do createUnit('priest', 1, startLocation(0)) end
-- enemy units createUnit('main_teepee', 2, startLocation(2))
startposGolems={135,30} for k=2, 7 do for i=1, 1 do addAttackingEnemy('fire_golem',k,startposGolems) end end startposArchers={150,70} for k=2, 7 do for i=1, 10 do addAttackingEnemy('fire_archer',k,startposArchers) addAttackingEnemy('stickfighter',k,startposArchers) end end
--objectives objective='firstwave' showMessage('Brief1', 'Benchmark') setDisplayText('firstwave') camerapos[1]=110 camerapos[2]=30 setCameraPosition(camerapos) startPerformanceTimer()
scripts.unitDied: --setCameraPosition(camerapos) if lastDeadUnit()==mycastle then endPerformanceTimer() --clearDisplayText() res=getPerformanceTimerResults() DisplayFormattedText("Your result: avg updateFps=%s , avg RenderFps=%s ",res[1],res[2]) --showMessage('Brief1', 'Benchmark') setPlayerAsWinner(1) endGame() end
